'''Sensors''': *Passive: 15/1D *Scan: 30/2D *Search: 45/2D *Focus: 2/2D+1 '''Capsule''': The Nella series is out of production. It is an older model, known for it's durability and reliability, but the design was discontinued after the marker standards were redefined by the YT-1300.
